divs: Sighting Detailsabout 6:00 pm 12-11-2008 i was sleeping and i saw a bright white glow of a light comeing from a person but i did not see the person. as soon as i awoke the light went away as i realised that i was being disterbed from my sleep. i got up for a few minets and went back to sleep about 30 minets later and about 9:30 pm 12-11-2008. a girl i thing was sitting on me she was not heavey and she kissed me on my right side of my face and got off of me and walked away into the darkness of my room. and i got up and ate something in the kitchen because she had disterbed me as i was sleeping. i am pertty shure all she did was sit on me and maybe looked at me she may have talked to me while i was in a sleeping state i do not know for shure. but she seemed plessent about something. she acted as if she knew me for a while. there was not much too this encounter.
